meanings.definition: The act or process of transmogrifying.
meanings.sent1: The transmogrifications of the caterpillar into a butterfly are truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The transmogrifications of the old building into a modern art gallery were impressive.
meanings.sent3: The transmogrifications of the Halloween costumes made everyone look unrecognizable.
meanings.sent4: The transmogrifications of the city skyline at night give it a magical appearance.
meanings.sent5: The transmogrifications of the landscape after the snowfall were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A complete change in form or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The sudden transmogrifications in the weather caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent2: The transmogrifications in her hairstyle made her almost unrecognizable.
meanings.sent3: The transmogrifications in the cake's design turned out to be a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: The transmogrifications in the garden gave it a whole new look.
meanings.sent5: The transmogrifications in his behavior were unexpected but welcome.

meanings.sent1: The transmogrifications of the tadpole into a frog fascinated the children.
meanings.sent2: The transmogrifications in technology have revolutionized our daily lives.
meanings.sent3: The transmogrifications in the plot of the movie kept the audience guessing.
meanings.sent4: The transmogrifications in her attitude towards work were truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The transmogrifications in the forest during autumn are a sight to behold.
